ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Bronze
ygData.msgSnippet: You don t say what level you are, but maybe check out sol b.  The kobolds there drop plenty of bronze.   Atrocity ...
ygData.messageBody:
You don't say what level you are, but maybe check out
sol b. The kobolds there drop plenty of bronze. \

Atrocity

--- "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
wrote:
> Is there a specific area of Unrest, ie. the
> courtyard, which room in the
> Mansion? I have been in Unrest for about 10 minutes
> and never made it into
> the house. I was 23rd at the time. Thanks.
>
> --
> Lasombra
>
>
